ActCanada Infrastructure Bank Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Appointing BDO Canada LLP and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditors of the Canada Infrastructure Bank
PrecisOrder appointing BDO CANADA LLP of Toronto, Ontario, and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITORS of the CANADA INFRASTRUCTURE BANK for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2022.
